class SpectralDataTimeSeries(wavelength=nan, wavelength_unit=None, data=array([[nan]]), data_unit=None, uncertainty=array([[nan]]), mask=False, time=nan, time_unit=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: cascade.data_model.data_model.SpectralData

Class defining timeseries of spectral data. This class inherits from SpectralData. The data now has one additional dimension: time Input: —– time

time of observation
time_unit
physical unit of time data
